trans-unit.source: The PowerShell Gallery does not support permanent deletion of items, because that would break anyone who is depending on it remaining available.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 資源庫不支援永久刪除項目，因為這樣會中斷任何仰賴該項目維持可用的人員。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the PowerShell Gallery supports a way to 'unlist' an item, which can be done in the item management page on the web site.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，PowerShell 資源庫支援將項目「取消列出」，該操作可於網站上的項目管理頁面完成。

trans-unit.source: When an item is unlisted, it no longer shows up in search and in any item listing, both on the PowerShell Gallery and using PowerShellGet commands.
trans-unit.target: 將項目取消列出後，在 PowerShell 資源庫中及使用 PowerShellGet 命令時，該項目都不會在搜尋及任何項目列表中顯示。

trans-unit.source: However, it remains downloadable by specifying its exact version, which is what allows the automated scripts to continue working.
trans-unit.target: 不過，該項目仍可透過指定其確切版本維持可供下載，其中確切版本可允許自動化的指令碼繼續運作。

trans-unit.source: If you run into an exceptional situation where you think one of your items must be deleted, this can be handled manually by the PowerShell Gallery team.
trans-unit.target: 如果您遇到例外狀況，且認為您的其中一個項目必須刪除時，PowerShell 資源庫小組可以手動處理此狀況。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there is a copyright infringement issue, or potentially harmful content, that could be a valid reason to delete it.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若發生著作權侵權問題，或是可能有害的內容，即有充分的理由可將其刪除。

trans-unit.source: You should submit a support request through [PowerShell Gallery] (http://www.PowerShellGallery.com) in that case.
trans-unit.target: 在此類情況下，您應透過 [PowerShell 資源庫] (http://www.PowerShellGallery.com) 提交支援要求。
